snippet: The bank’s ombudsman delivered a stinging review of a loan to a palm-oil company engaged in a violent conflict with poor farm workers over land in Honduras.
abstract: World Bank ombudsman issues a stinging critique of the bank’s private-sector arm over a loan to a Honduran palm-oil company engaged in a violent conflict with farm workers over land tenure.
lead_paragraph: The bank’s ombudsman delivered a stinging review of a loan to a palm-oil company engaged in a violent conflict with poor farm workers over land in Honduras.

headline.main: World Bank Is Criticized for Honduran Loan
headline.print_headline: World Bank Is Criticized for Honduran Loan

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
